medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent sharp right lower quadrant pain for 3 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days prior to admission, characterized by colicky pain lasting about 15 minutes per episode, with exacerbation experienced during movement, especially walking. There are no relieving factors.
